Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 1 of 3 (Garbage Collection) -- 3/4% S&U Tax Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 1 of 3
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of three-fourths of one percent (3/4%) (the "Sales Tax") (an estimated $2,400,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Sales Tax for an entire year), upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish, for an additional ten (10) years, commencing July 1, 2019, with the proceeds of the Sales Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Sales Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purpose of providing garbage and solid waste collection and disposal in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 2 of 3 (Public Roads and Bridges) -- 1/4% S&U Tax Renewal - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Parishwide Proposition No. 2 of 3
(Sales Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to continue to levy and collect a tax of one-fourth of one percent (1/4%) (the "Sales Tax") (an estimated $800,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Sales Tax for an entire year), upon the sale at retail, the use, the lease or rental, the consumption, and the storage for use or consumption, of tangible personal property and on sales of services in the Parish, for an additional ten (10) years, commencing July 1, 2019, with the proceeds of the Sales Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Sales Tax) to be dedicated and used for the purpose of constructing, improving and maintaining public roads, highways and bridges within the Parish, including the purchase of road maintenance equipment, title to which shall be in the public?

Race.SpecificTitle: PW Prop. No. 3 of 3 (Garbage Collection) -- 8 Mills - PJ - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), be authorized to levy a special tax of eight (8) mills (the "Millage Tax") on all the property subject to taxation in the Parish (an estimated $1,128,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Millage Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2019 and ending with the year 2028, for the purpose of providing garbage and solid waste collection and disposal in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection District No. 2 -- 10 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Fire Protection District No. 2 Proposition
(Millage Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 2 of the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a special tax of ten (10) mills on all the property subject to taxation in the District for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2021 and ending with the year 2030 (an estimated $1,068,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and/or operating fire protection facilities and equipment in and for the District, including the cost of paying the salaries of firemen, obtaining water for fire protection purposes and paying charges for fire hydrant rentals and services?

Race.SpecificTitle: Hospital Service District No. 1 -- 4.90 Mills Renewal - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
Hospital Service District No. 1 Proposition
(Tax Renewal)
Race.FullText: Shall Hospital Service District No. 1 of the Parish of Avoyelles, State of Louisiana (the "District"), levy a four and ninety hundredths (4.90) mills tax on all the property subject to taxation within the District (an estimated $131,800 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2020 and ending with the year 2029, for the purpose of improving, maintaining and operating the hospital facilities of the District?
